website_summaries.verdict: A stylish set of holiday cards made from high-quality materials.
pros: Hand-drawn designs are simple and adorable
Pack of 32 cards also comes with envelopes and gold stickers
Blank cards allow you to add your own greeting
Made from thick, sturdy card stock
Cards come in a holiday-themed storage box
cons: Cards are a little smaller than the average greeting card

customer_reviews.title: They are blank inside
customer_reviews.text: The cards are on sturdy paper and the cover pics seem fine. They are blank inside though. When you have a lot to send out, the prescribed well wishes on the inside of the card tends to be optimal. I would not have bought them had I realized this. Others who have time to write out something on each card may find them more than reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: FlexGold

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Variety - Not all cards refer to "Christmas"
customer_reviews.text: These are gorgeous quality cards - very thick paper, nice colors. Envelopes are also thick paper. They come with stickers too. You get two of each design. Not all are "Christmas" cards - I got these for acquaintances and work buddies that I want to thank or send holiday greetings to this season. I would absolutely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: K Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Best Cards out There
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough positive things about this purchase. I've been sending out holiday cards for the last 3 years, searching high and low online and in brick and mortar establishments to try and find low-cost, beautiful cards. These are PERFECT. High quality, clean and bright images, strong envelopes, and not every card refers to Christmas. Even the box is adorable. You couldn't ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Jecker

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Adorable.
customer_reviews.text: Really well done cards, on high quality cardstock. I love the envelope stickers as well!!! You get two of each design and the cards are all really darling. I also really loved the personal touch they add with the "Thank You" card inside the top of the box! Can't wait to use these for the holidays.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: This box of 32 cards/envelopes, two of each design, worked really well for us. There's a nice variety -- Merry Christmas, Happy Holidays, Warm Wishes, Feliz Navidad, even Happy New Year -- so we could select the appropriate sentiment for each of the recipients. There's no message inside, so a handwritten note (or a BIG signature) is needed. We send out only a handful of cards these days, so it's nice to not have a bunch of leftovers in one design that linger in the stationery drawer. The designs are middle-of-the-road contemporary, and the paper quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: JG28804

customer_reviews.title: Great boxed set
customer_reviews.text: These cards are high quality. They are printed on heavy card stock with quality inks and the illustrations are very cute. They come in a nice little box, and the set includes mailing seals. I would order these again.
customer_reviews.author: painter lady

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this card set! There is a good variety of cards and they are blank so you can write whatever you want. They also come with white envelopes and cute stickers to seal them.
customer_reviews.author: lj4life

customer_reviews.title: Appreciate the envelope seal stickers that comes with it
customer_reviews.text: Wished the cards were a matte finish rather than the gloss that it is. I like that it has stickers to seal envelopes. Overall good value for the amount of cards that are included. The box that it comes in is nice.
customer_reviews.author: VLB

customer_reviews.title: Another set of beautiful quality cards from Mininalmart
customer_reviews.text: This is the third set of Mininalmart cards that I have purchased, and I have never been disappointed. The cards are always beautifully designed with a great variety for all recipients. I love the pretty and sturdy box that holds the cards, so not only are they protected in shipping, they store well in between use.
customer_reviews.author: SlyGlamster

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cards
customer_reviews.text: So many beautiful cards! A little smaller than your average card, but I didn’t get any complaints. A great inexpensive way to send out a bunch of Christmas cards. Even came with stickers to “seal” the envelopes. I had two Happy New Year cards I didn’t send out but that’s just me
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Quality
customer_reviews.text: The cards are housed in a sturdy box that has a uniform print along the exterior which makes it great for display on a desk or shelf. The cards themselves are great print quality on sturdy card stock. The envelopes are on thicker paper as well so there’s no concern for ink bleeding or seeing the card through the envelope. I love these so much I plan to purchase the other sets.
customer_reviews.author: Aidan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Variety!
customer_reviews.text: These cards are beautiful and come in an amazing array of themes. Traditional designs, whimsical, Merry Christmas or happy holidays this box has a little of everything. I wish the cards were a little bigger but, unless you plan to write a recap of your entire year, there should be plenty of space to send your holiday greetings. I will definitely shop this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: These were adorable and got rave reviews from the people who received them. Actually saw them in a boutique shop right before Christmas for quite a bit more than advertised here. It was fun to go old school and write a note vs sending a picture with a greeting on it for the holidays. Would absolutely buy from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Decana

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Great value! I love how quaint the designs are and how much variety is offered. I am quite picky about my greeting cards and I was impressed with the quality, packaging, and artistry. This purchase encouraged me to purchase the Minimalmart birthday set. It’s so convenient to have greeting cards on hand!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for office cards. Not too pricey, not sentimental, seasonal holiday and non-holiday but still winter variety for different co-workers. I would order a variety like this for year round use too.
customer_reviews.author: StitchedbySara

customer_reviews.title: LOVE the cards, but only received 31
customer_reviews.text: I love these cards, they are so cute and will definitely be a hit with my friends and family. I would have given 5 stars, but going through the box, I noticed I only received 31 cards when there should be 32. I am a little disappointed about this as 32 was the exact number I needed. But besides the miscount the cards themselves are great.
customer_reviews.author: Jordann Dempsey

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it!
customer_reviews.text: So so glad I bought these! I was looking for a beautiful variety set and couldn’t find anything I liked. I saw this and thought it was too good to be true for the price but it’s not! It’s gorgeous and I love the box It comes in. I love every single design In the pack and actually like that they are blank inside. Definitely a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Great set of basic cards
customer_reviews.text: I love the charming artwork on each card. It also comes with envelopes and seals. You can’t beat the low price of this set of cards either. I definitely would buy these again!
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Fenoglio

customer_reviews.title: Looove them!
customer_reviews.text: I love the style and variety of cards in this box! I bought two and need another before Xmas already. Slightly smaller than a 4x6 photo, so when including pics, I had to cut them. Will buy lots more from this company because I'm so happy with what came!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Loved every card!
customer_reviews.text: Super stinking cute and well made! Loved every one in this assorted holiday set. It also came with envelope seals which I wasn’t expecting!
customer_reviews.author: MGal

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Thoughtful packaging, beautiful and cheery artwork - so easy to find a card that suits each personality on my list. Would absolutely purchase these again!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: love these cards
customer_reviews.text: I used them to hand out at work for Christmas; they were a couple for new years in the box. They were beautiful and the quality is pretty amazing. I would buy from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Lisandra Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Cute for handwritten cards
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved these. They came in a timely manner and the packaging is super cute. I am using them for christmas/thank you cards for my wedding. High quality card stock type paper for the cards and they come with envelopes and cute stickers. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Arianna Wambach

customer_reviews.title: Blank inside
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed because there were no words inside the card. The description should have specified that it was blank inside. Otherwise very beautiful cards.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha W. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful BLANK Cards
customer_reviews.text: I bought these cards because the description said some of them had greetings written inside. This was not the case-- they are all blank. The cards are still gorgeous and I will be happy to send them out, just a bit disappointed with that one discrepancy.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable high quality cards for a great price. These were comparable to my Hallmark cards that are $3-$5 a piece!! Only a few that I didn't love, but that was personal preference, nothing wrong with the card itself! Will purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Alli

customer_reviews.title: Worth it! So many compliments!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT QUALITY! Great bargain. Will buy again next holiday season 💕💕
customer_reviews.author: Georgia

customer_reviews.title: Better than I deserve
customer_reviews.text: Cute cards, exactly as much variety as necessary so no two co-workers will get the same one. The quality is nice too, they definitely feel and look more expensive than they were.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas cards
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and Great quality. Absoutly Adorable pictures. come with cute stickers that can be used to close the envelopes, really useful. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Hyeri

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Designs, Well Priced
customer_reviews.text: Loved these cards! Well priced and the designs were beautiful. I also bought the assorted Birthday Card Box Set, and the designs are just as lovely!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Newell

customer_reviews.title: Many designs
customer_reviews.text: Lots of card designs to choose from and they were cute. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what it said it was. Only thing I would change is the weight of the box. Overall a very good product.
customer_reviews.author: SSouth

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: The cards are great quality, each is more adorable than the next, and the price is a steal. Can't go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: These are really lovely! Blank on the inside for whatever you need to write and great printing quality. The seals are a perfect last touch and the variety is great.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: they do not have a verse inside.
customer_reviews.text: no inside christmas greeting,, have to makeup your own greeting This was not in the sales info. Jim F.
customer_reviews.author: 15414903018     Jim F.

customer_reviews.title: Best Card Set Ever
customer_reviews.text: This is packaged so well and I LOVE each one of the cards. I will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Houston Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great quality card
customer_reviews.text: The cards a very nice quality, we used them for a Girl Scouts project, they are very pretty cards.
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: Adorable Christmas Cards with free sticker inside!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using MinimalMart Birthday card set and the quality is amazing. I really enjoyed writing on it and recipients also compliment about how adorable and durable it is. About a month ago, I searched Online to see if they had Holiday cards available for purchase but I couldn’t find it. But I searched online few days ago again!! And it was available!! I was so thrilled and made my purchase immidiately! So excited!! There is one card that had a noticable stain on the corner so that is a bit of a disappointment. I wont be using that card! But besides that, everything looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Strawberry Macchiato

customer_reviews.title: Cards folded poorly
customer_reviews.text: I hate giving this three stars because the illustrations on the cards are so perfect. They are printed well and look as advertised, BUT there are five or so cards in the box that are flat out folded crooked. There are two that are folded so poorly they won't fit in their envelope. I may try to find my bone folder and fix them, but I'll probably just throw them away. Even the cheapest cards are folded down the center.
customer_reviews.author: LeAnn

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: i was very happy with my purchase. these Christmas cards are printed on heavy duty thick paper. the pictures are beautiful and i like some so much im thinking about framing to use as Christmas decoration. the cards are blank inside but they are small so its easy to come up with something to write. Would purchase again
customer_reviews.author: emroto

customer_reviews.title: Cute, vintage-inspired designs without the Rifle Paper price
customer_reviews.text: Can’t beat these for the price. I send a lot of holiday cards so I can’t spend $5 per card. These worked perfect for me and are made on nice, thick paper. They don’t feel cheap at all. Even the envelopes that come in the box are good quality. And they come with festive seals. Everything you need in one box!
customer_reviews.author: A. Applebaum

customer_reviews.title: Very small!!!
customer_reviews.text: These cards are much smaller than normal cards. I would be embarrassed to mail them to my friends and family. I used them as gift tags basically. The designs and quality are very good. They should just make them full size and sell for a few dollars more.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I love these cards! There are two of each design, and the insides are blank. There are a variety of phrases from Merry Christmas, Season's Greetings, Happy New Year, Feliz Navidad etc, so you will be able to find a perfect card for everyone on your list. Also love that they come with cute stickers to seal the cards with.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Lovely cards
customer_reviews.text: Love the illustrations and designs on the cards. Quality paper as well! And to top it off it was a great price. Can't wait to send them out :) Bought another box too.
customer_reviews.author: mchap

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and well made
customer_reviews.text: I love these cards! Beautifully made and good quality. There were one-two cards that were cute off center and I couldn’t use them- but otherwise they were great quality! I’d buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Jones

customer_reviews.title: Variety of Holiday Cards for Everyone on Your List
customer_reviews.text: The cards are even more lovely in person, with metallic accents to add to the gorgeous artwork. Happy to have these ready to go for the holidays rather than having to buy pricey individual cards.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Walker

customer_reviews.title: Blank on the inside but great variety
customer_reviews.text: I’m disappointed that these didn’t have anything written inside of them
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Love love love love it! Cute desigs and the boxes are sturdy enough.
customer_reviews.author: Poki

customer_reviews.title: Really love these cards
customer_reviews.text: I ordered birthday cards and holiday cards from them and really really love the design and quality. 5 starts.
customer_reviews.author: nivens

product_meta.title: Minimalmart Premium Christmas Cards Box Set of 32 Assorted Premium Cards with Gold Embellishments and Stickers – Boxed Assortment Pack with Envelopes - Winter Holiday Xmas Greeting Cards
product_meta.description: INSIDE THE MINIMALMART CHRISTMAS GREETING CARD BOXED SET In the Minimalmart boxed set, we invite you to discover the delight of 32 christmas greeting cards featuring lovingly hand-drawn 16 DIFFERENT designs. Just open up the box to simplify your life, make your friends and family feel loved, and reinspire your passion for the art of stationery. This gorgeous array of Christmas cards with envelopes included provides you with elegant and charming wishes for everyone, as well as some blank cards for your own personal messages. All printed on fine archival (5.5x4.25”) paper and stamped with our gold emblem guaranteeing top quality. Stationery is a necessity, but it should always feel like a luxury. Minimalmart: Devoted to Joy and Meaning.
feature_bullets: 32 Hand-drawn card to simplify you Christmas time this Holiday Season
Cards are printed on high-quality fine archival paper for elegance and durability
32 corresponding enveloped, stickers included and packed together with greeting card to ensure the comfort and convenience
16 DIFFERENT Designs Cards are stamped with our signature gold emblem which guarantees top quality
If you're not satisfied with our greeting cards, Minimalmart will refund your purchase

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
